channel.title: We R Robots
channel.description: Recent content on We R Robots

item.title: How did I get here and why?
item.description: How did I get here? Why is my keyboard split in half? Wait, what is up with all of my keys?!?! Why would I think that this mediocre typing score was even worth writing about? Let’s go back a bit. I had been intrigued for some time now by the idea of a better typing experience, which led me to explore many ideas, including split keyboards with minimal keys. “More ergonomic!
